Acrylic Heavy Body Colors

  1. TOP
  2. Our Products
  3. Acrylics
  4. Acrylic Heavy Body Colors

Holbein Artists’ Acrylic Polymer Emulsion Colors

  • Web Cotalog
  • Sets

Holbein’ s new acrylic range is a high quality, heavy body artist acrylic, speciﬁcally

designed toadd more luster and brilliance to your paintings.

With a 114 year history of producing the ﬁnest artist grade color available, Holbein is immensely proud of their latest accomplishment: A completely re-engineered Artist Acrylic which will undoubtedly deliver more color vigor and improved lightfast ratings.

Utilizing the best traditional inorganic pigments as well as the latest and the most up to date organic pigments, the new Holbein Artist acrylic

range affords the user seamless and effortless mixing and thinning.

Superior, smooth and vivid in every way, the new Holbein Artist Acrylic range is certain to meet and surpass the demands of the modern

artist, whether painting small or large, opaque or transparent. The line provides 113 carefully detailed colors.
